page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content: In the village there are 4 holiday cottages which are let out mainly for the summer or fishing season. Gartly is ideally situated for touring around the area.It has several distilleries and several ancient buildings close by, and has easy access to the coastal towns or mountains. Most of the fishing is done in the Huntly waters but the River Bogie at Gartly does afford some sport. On Corskie Hill near the Haining Quarries is a cross-country ski track. The Forestry roads are often used as the rough section in car rallies. Planning permission has been granted for a caravan site behind the hotel.
